name: Gensokyo Defenders / 幻想郷ディフェンダーズ / 幻想鄉守護者
description: Use Traps and Spell Cards to fight back the magical masses! Blistering shoot-em-up action meets tactical tower defense as you choose from almost 20 popular characters to stop the fairy onslaught! Take advantage of their unique powers and tricky Traps to freeze, fry, and blow your enemies away!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 or newer Processor: intelCorei7 or newer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForceGTX550 or newer DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
